title: The Power of Deep Listening - Part 1 (2021-03-03)
itunes:title: The Power of Deep Listening - Part 1
description: The Power of Deep Listening - Part 1 (2021-03-03) - Listening deeply is the gateway to realizing connection. It’s what allows us to move through life with a wise, loving and healing presence. These two talks explore our blocks to true listening, and offer teachings and practices that can directly cultivate this invaluable capacity.
